main: ^The virus infects the part of the lab you are in. The world at large has been struggling against this virus as well.
^Luckily you have what it takes to save the world.
^You are equipped with the latest antivirus, which allows you to detect the virus as purple particles on your energy meter.
^If your energy becomes 100% corrupted, you will lose all control. Please be mindful when making connections to sources.
